RelatedSentence: Robert Robb : Anyone accused of wrongdoing should get a decision from an impartial adjudicator , even Tom Horne .

Yavapai County Attorney Sheila Polk decided not to accept the recommendation of an administrative law judge and stuck with her finding that Attorney General Tom Horne illegally coordinated with an independent campaign .

Yavapai County Attorney Sheila Polk decided not to accept the recommendation of an administrative law judge and stuck with her finding that Attorney General Tom Horne illegally coordinated with an independent campaign .

Yavapai County Attorney Sheila Polk decided not to accept the recommendation of an administrative law judge and stuck with her finding that Attorney General Tom Horne illegally coordinated with an independent campaign .
I do n't think she should have done that .
I do n't think she should have done that .
Not because she does n't have an argument , but because of the peculiar procedural status of the case .

Arizona has a weird system of administrative law in this respect : While there are independent administrative law judges , their decisions are merely recommendations to agency heads , who can overturn them .

Arizona has a weird system of administrative law in this respect : While there are independent administrative law judges , their decisions are merely recommendations to agency heads , who can overturn them .
A superior court judge does n't reconsider the case on the merits .
Instead , the judge can overturn an administrative decision only on the basis that it was arbitrary and capricious , an abuse of discretion or clearly contrary to the evidence or the law .
In particular , a prosecutor should n't have the final word .
Lord knows , it 's hard to work up any sympathy for Tom Horne these days .
But in this matter , he 's not getting a fair shake .
